headline: sawyer click
subhead: Hi! I'm Sawyer Click, a New York-based data journalist and graphics reporter currently getting my M.S. in data journalism from Columbia University.
bio: Hi! I'm Sawyer Click, a New York-based data viz nerd. I have projects below that showcase my sweet skills in Python, Illustrator and D3.js, but this secret section is dedicated to how cool I am. I'm a north Texas native with an obsession over punk and jazz music. In my free time I play Overwatch, pet my dog Chunkie, and riff hard on my guitar. Hire me!
